long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Open in X seconds (oixs) allows you to open links with a variable delay of your choosing. Minimal and customizable, with very intuitive interface, it aims to improve modern browsing experience for users with less stable connection or older hardware.


Instructions: 

- alt + click on a link
(the key can be changed in settings)

- move mouse left or right to adjust the knob
(larger angle = longer delay)

- left click to start the timer
(right click or escape to cancel)

- link is opened once the timer runs out

- timers can be canceled from the toolbar


Watch the demo video here:
https://github.com/Dimithrandir/oixs?tab=readme-ov-file#demo
